thread.title: Wai Kong Lau
thread.title_full: Car Hire Labs bewertet von Wai Kong Lau

author: Wai Kong	Lau
title: Wai Kong Lau
text: When I was given a Quote: d price it was all in HKD (Hong Kong Dollars), but when I paid for the balance you had charged me EUR instead for the deposit, and the remaining balance I will have to pay in GBP at the time when I collect the car, which this will definitely cost me more and not the Quote: d amount given by you at first. I am not satisfied at all.
